title: Bug 23787[Properties dialog] Project Properties Info page should not use text fields
description: Bug 23787[Properties dialog] Project PropertiesInfo page should not use text fields Integration build 09/17.Looks bad on all motif platforms.
OB: When viewing the Project Properties Info page on motif platforms (such as Solaris, AIX, and HPUX), the text fields used for displaying information have automatic borders that identify them as user input targets. Additionally, on Solaris, AIX, and HPUX, these fields have different colored backgrounds, which make them stand out much worse compared to other platforms like Windows.
SR: To reproduce this issue: 1. Select a Project 2. Right-click and choose Properties 3. On the subsequent Info page, observe the readonly fields (such as Path, Type, etc.)
